entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 March 2023
